metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24824 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: cmark-gfm is GitHub's fork of cmark, a CommonMark parsing and renderinglibrary and program in C. A polynomial time complexity issue in cmark-gfmmay lead to unbounded resource exhaustion and subsequent denial of service.This CVE covers quadratic complexity issues when parsing text which leadswith either large numbers of `>` or `-` characters. This issue has beenaddressed in version 0.29.0.gfm.10. Users are advised to upgrade. Usersunable to upgrade should validate that their input comes from trustedsources.

criterions.comment: cmark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
